title: Supervisory Room Inspection
description: A housekeeping supervisor needs to inspect a room that a housekeeper has marked as 'Clean' before it can be made available for guests.

tasks.description: The supervisor receives a notification that a room is ready for inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor is alerted to the task.

tasks.description: The supervisor uses a digital checklist on their device to inspect the room against hotel standards.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor completes the inspection checklist.

tasks.description: If the room passes inspection, the supervisor updates its status to 'Ready', making it available in the PMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The room passes and its status is updated to 'Ready'.
